scripts.demo:backend: node -e "setInterval(() => console.log('API ready...  API ready...  API ready...  API ready...  API ready...'), 600)"
scripts.demo:errors: node -e "setInterval(() => { console.log('\x1b[32mOK: All good\x1b[0m'); console.log('\x1b[33mWARN: Deprecated API used\x1b[0m'); console.log('\x1b[31mERROR: Connection failed\x1b[0m'); console.log('Normal log message'); }, 2000)"
scripts.demo:build: node -e "let i=0; setInterval(() => { i++; if(i%5===0) console.log('\x1b[31mError: Type mismatch in file.ts:42\x1b[0m'); else if(i%3===0) console.log('\x1b[33mWarning: Unused variable\x1b[0m'); else console.log('\x1b[36mCompiling module ' + i + '...\x1b[0m'); }, 800)"
